item.title: FUGAL: Feature-fortified Unrestricted Graph Alignment
item.description: FUGAL: a groundbreaking graph alignment method surpassing state-of-the-art accuracy without compromising efficiency by directly aligning adjacency matrices.

item.title: GraphTrail: Translating GNN Predictions into Human-Interpretable Logical Rules
item.description: GRAPHTRAIL unveils the first end-to-end global GNN explainer, translating black-box GNN predictions into easily interpretable boolean formulas over subgraph concepts, achieving significant improvement…
